AUTO_ORGANISATION: Auto organized notes based on source websites.
COLOUR_CUSTOMISATION: Recall your notes by the colour you saved them with.
Long_Description: Long researches eating up time? Well, no more.Introducing the Note Maker.
NOTE_LIBRARY: Trace back to the source articles using a retractable link to the source site.
SAVE_TIME: Save the trouble of the traditional cut, copy, paste and move onto the next level of content development.
SEAMLESS_RESEARCH: Pick the lines that you find are resourceful and continue reading.
Short_Description: Pick and store the most resourceful things you read on the web.
name: Note Maker
title: Note Maker
